Game Changer movie review Live Updates: Reviews call Ram Charan film ‘a Pongal, Sakranti gift’; will it meet the box office expectations? - The Indian Express
summary:
Game Changer Movie Review: Ram Charan's Anticipated Release for Pongal

Publication Date: January 2025   |   Source: The Indian Express

Game Changer marks Ram Charan's return as a solo hero in a film directed by Shankar, promising a commercial potboiler for audiences. The film is anticipated to perform well at the box office during the Sankranti festival.

  • Ram Charan stars alongside Kiara Advani in this high-stakes action film.
  • Shankar's first direct Telugu film is generating considerable buzz due to its engaging trailer.
  • The story follows the themes of power, corruption, and the classic good vs evil narrative.
  • The film aims to set a commercial benchmark for Telugu cinema in 2025.
  • Game Changer also features notable actors like SJ Suryah, Anjali, and Jayaram.
“He is hoping to make a lasting impression in a commercial potboiler, helmed by the OG of this genre, Shankar.”

The film has the potential to kickstart the year with impressive box office numbers, drawing significant interest from Ram Charan's fanbase and the Telugu film audience.

Ram Charan's Game Changer: Why Naanaa Hyraanaa Song Isn't Included & When It Will Get Added To The Runtime - Filmibeat
summary:
Ram Charan's Game Changer: Why Naanaa Hyraanaa Song Isn't Included & When It Will Get Added To The Runtime

Publication Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Filmibeat

Ram Charan, Kiara Advani, and Shankar's film Game Changer debuted worldwide on January 10. The film has received mixed reviews and has been released in three languages featuring Ram Charan in a dual role.

  • The film released as the first major Tollywood release for the Sankranthi festival.
  • Ram Charan plays Ram Nandan IAS, facing political challenges in Visakhapatnam.
  • The bustling and technically advanced song Naanaa Hyraanaa is not included in the initial release due to processing issues.
  • The song will be added to the runtime starting January 14.
“The song was shot using about Rs 27 Crore and is the first Indian song filmed with an infrared camera.”

Despite initial setbacks, Game Changer has set the stage for an exciting inclusion with its unique song Naanaa Hyraanaa, promising to enhance the cinematic experience moving forward.
newTitle: Ram Charan's Game Changer: Release Details and Naanaa Hyraanaa Song Inclusion

summary:
Kangana Ranaut Wants To Work With Karan Johar 'Sir', Offers Him A Movie: 'I Am Sorry...'

Publication Date: January 10, 2025

Source: News18

In a surprising turn of events, Kangana Ranaut, known for her harsh criticism of Karan Johar, has expressed her desire to work with him. During an appearance on 'Indian Idol', she referred to him as 'sir' and made an official offer.

  • Kangana expressed regret for past tensions and invited Karan to collaborate on a meaningful film.
  • She emphasized the desire to offer him a substantial role, distancing from typical Bollywood tropes.
  • Historically, Kangana has been vocal against Karan, calling him a 'movie mafia' and criticizing his contribution to Indian cinema.
“I’m sorry to say, but Karan sir should do a movie with me. I’ll give him a very good role...”

This unexpected olive branch from Kangana raises questions about future collaborations in Bollywood, reflecting the constantly evolving dynamics within the industry.
newTitle: Kangana Ranaut Expresses Desire to Collaborate with Karan Johar

summary:
Fateh X review: Sonu Sood wins over the internet with directorial debut

Published On: Jan 10, 2025

Source: India Today

Actor-producer Sonu Sood has made his directorial debut with Fateh, an action film that has received widespread acclaim on social media.

  • Fateh released in cinemas on January 10, 2025.
  • The film is praised for its thrilling sequences and strong performances.
  • Sonu Sood both directs and stars in the film, which features an ensemble cast including Jacqueliene Fernandez, Vijay Raaz, and Naseeruddin Shah.
  • The movie is inspired by true events and is expected to perform well at the box office.
“Fateh is an action entertainer with a good storyline. Sonu Sood has impressed with his directorial debut.”
“Fateh is a full-throttle action ride! A must-watch for action lovers!”

Overall, Fateh has made a significant impact on viewers and is a noteworthy addition to Sonu Sood's career.

summary:
Viral Video of Woman Singing Aaj Ki Raat While Her Son Dances

Published On: Jan 10, 2025

Source: India Today

A viral video of a woman singing Aaj Ki Raat while playing the tune on her harmonium has delighted the internet, especially as her son dances beside her.

  • The video features a woman singing Tamannaah Bhatia’s Aaj Ki Raat.
  • Her son attempts to recreate the dance steps of the song, eliciting laughter from her.
  • The video has gone viral, gathering millions of views across social media platforms.
  • Aaj Ki Raat is a song from the movie Stree 2, sung by Madhubanti Bagchi and Divya Kumar.
“The internet enjoyed the mother-son duo's video just as much, and that is clear from the comments.”

The joy and connection showcased in this heartwarming video have captured the attention and affection of viewers online.
newTitle: Viral Video of Woman Singing Aaj Ki Raat While Her Son Dances

summary:
Rakul Preet Singh stuns in 'blush pink' outfit

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Bollywood actress Rakul Preet Singh treated her fans with a string of stunning pictures of herself dressed in "blush pink" during a recent photoshoot. In the images, she paired an oversized shirt with gold jewelry, and invited her fans to suggest captions for her post.

  • Rakul shared her photos on Instagram, seeking creative captions from her followers.
  • Her look included a golden choker, matt makeup, and a messy bun.
  • Earlier, she posted about enjoying her recent holiday, reflecting on letting go of guilt related to food indulgence.
  • Rakul will star in the upcoming film 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' alongside Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar, set for release on February 21.
"How you feel is more important than how you look... no one's validation is more important than your acceptance of yourself."

The article highlights Rakul's confidence in embracing her appearance and her upcoming romantic comedy film.

title: Shah Rukh Khan turns down Chamunda; sets eyes on a unique project with Maddock and Amar Kaushik - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Shah Rukh Khan Turns Down Chamunda for Unique Project with Maddock

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: Bollywood Hungama

Following the success of Stree 2, Shah Rukh Khan met with Dinesh Vijan and director Amar Kaushik to discuss potential collaborations, yet he decided to pass on the lead role in Chamunda.

  • Shah Rukh was approached to star in Chamunda, a horror-comedy planned for release in 2026.
  • SRK prefers to create a new universe rather than joining an existing one.
  • He has requested a fresh concept from Maddock and Amar Kaushik.
  • The collaboration discussions are still ongoing, with them exploring new ideas.
  • Chamunda was just one of several projects pitched to him by Vijan.
"Shah Rukh Khan didn't want to enter an already established universe and rather start a new world with Maddock and Amar Kaushik." - Source

This development marks a significant shift in Shah Rukh's project choices as he looks for innovative narratives to explore.
newTitle: Shah Rukh Khan Turns Down Chamunda for Unique Project with Maddock

summary:
From Shanaya Kapoor, Aryan Khan to Rasha Thadani: 7 Star Kids Making Their Bollywood Debut in 2025

Date: Jan 10, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

2025 has arrived with a fresh wave of star kids eager to debut in the Hindi film industry. This article explores seven star kids ready to take the leap and examines their backgrounds, debuts, and the films they're associated with this year.

  • Shanaya Kapoor: Set to debut in Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan.
  • Ibrahim Ali Khan: Making his debut in Sarzameen.
  • Ahaan Panday: Starring in a young love story directed by Mohit Suri.
  • Rasha Thadani: Debuting in Azaad, releasing on January 17.
  • Aaman Devgan: Also debuting in Azaad.
  • Simar Bhatia: Set to appear in Ikkis.
  • Aryan Khan: Making his debut as a writer and director with the Netflix series Stardom.
“After surfing through the batch of 2025, who do you have the highest expectations from this year?”

This year is poised for exciting new entries in Bollywood, as these star kids step into the limelight, each with their unique backgrounds and flair.
